text: A great game and even better music. This game made me excited again for Yoshi games, hopefully the Switch game is solid and they understand that we want more soundtracks like this one. It seems to bring some nice new ideas to the table.

text:
I've gone through your 2000+ vgm playlist (in the last 5 days) and discovered many great new songs.
Together with my own favorite retro videogame tracks I now have a 150+ songs playlist for my Pi (retropie). Thanks so much!
author: RJ

text:
Hah. That realization when this is playing in the background and you're not really paying attention, but your ears subconsciously perk up and then you stop to pay attention and go "hey! this is freakin awesome".
Side note: Literally picked this game up today as a Xmas gift to myself.
author: boyblob

text: This theme didn’t really click with me at first, but on the second loop, wow, I’m really starting to appreciate this. Very well made.

text: Aegis29 the only thing I didn't enjoy in the mix here was the acoustic guitar.   But then... In broader context, this game is often about the soft and cozy acoustic I guess, so...
